Page.Table:
PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Warehouse No. or (ALL) Text PPDField01 1 4 R Enter Warehouse # or (ALL)
Enter Product No. or (ALL) Text PPDField02 1 15 R Enter a valid product # or (ALL)
Enter Product Line or (ALL) Text PPDField03 1 6 R Enter a valid product line or (ALL)
Enter Major Line or (ALL) Text PPDField04 1 8 R Enter a valid major line or (ALL)
Enter Basis Weight or (ALL) Text PPDField05 1 8 R Enter a valid basis weight or (ALL)
Enter Option (S)ummary or (D)etail DropDown PPDField06 1 1 R Enter a valid option (S), (D) H S,D (SUMMARY),(DETAIL)
Enter Starting Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField07 6 8 R Enter a valid starting date
Enter Ending Date (MM/DD/YY) Text PPDField08 6 8 R Enter a valid ending date
Enter Starting Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField09 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
Enter Ending Period (YYYYPP) or (ALL) Text PPDField10 1 6 R Enter a valid period (YYYYPP)
